text: The Matanikau River of Guadalcanal, Solomon Islands, is located in the northwest part of the island. During the World War II Guadalcanal campaign, several significant engagements occurred between United States and Japanese forces near the river. ==References== * * *- Interactive animation of the battle * *- Web site with many pictures of Guadalcanal battle sites from 1942 and how they look now. * * * * * Category:Guadalcanal Category:Rivers of the Solomon Islands
title: Matanikau River
